biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" by his peers, is a familiar and respected figure at the Hector Trophée. Representing Hirsala Golf, Jarkko brings a level of intensity and focus to the competition that few can match. While he maintains a stoic demeanor on the course, those who know him well speak of his incredible humor and his passion for golf.

With 8 past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jarkko's experience is undeniable, and he is slated to make his ninth appearance in 2025. His deep understanding of the game, combined with his strategic approach, has led him to one coveted Hector Trophée victory as well as one individual Victor Trophy title. He is known for his meticulous preparation and his ability to adapt to any situation, making him a formidable opponent in both individual and team play.

Jarkko's continued participation in the Hector Trophée demonstrates his unwavering commitment to the sport and his relentless pursuit of excellence. As he prepares for the upcoming tournament, all eyes will be on Jarkko to see if he can once again rise to the occasion and add to his impressive record.
